DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of a multi factorial preventive scheme of action (including fluvastatin and valsartan) to reduce the overall risk level in patients with metabolic syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Reducing the Overall Risk Level in Patients Suffering From Metabolic Syndrome
